summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 HONDA ACCORD.  THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE WIRE UNDERNEATH THE DRIVER'S SEAT FAILED DUE TO THE AIR BAG SENSOR MODULE.  THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 07V001000 (AIR BAGS:FRONTAL:SENSOR/CONTROL MODULE).  THE VEHICLE WILL BE REPAIRED AT THE CONTACT'S EXPENSE.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 52,000.
